QuestData.Title: The Isle of Emerald
QuestData.Description:
Your part in this has not escaped me, mortal. It is in large part due to your bravery that we were able to defeat the Primalists.
I have invited the centaur to join me under the Ancient Bough. You, along with the Khanam Matra and her people, are welcome in our home.
Follow this path through the archway across the water and into the trees beyond. I will wait for you there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Merithra in the Ancient Bough.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to the Ancient Bough. You stand before the Emerald Oathstone of the green dragonflight.
